input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
Z-Lite 550PHBR-533PM-ORBZ Outdoor Pier Mount Light, Matte Opal Shade Steel

Product specifications:
The geometric lines of the Abbey family combine well with contemporary home styling as well as homes in the craftsmen style
This large wall mount fixture is made of steel and finished in black with matte opal glass
It is made of highly durable material

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Get a stylish accent for your home exterior with the Z-Lite 550PHBR-533PM-ORBZ Outdoor Pier Mount Light. This large wall mount fixture is made of steel and finished in black with matte opal glass. The geometric lines of the Abbey family combine well with contemporary home styling as well as homes in the craftsmen style. This durable outdoor light is made of highly durable material and is weather-resistant. Add some modern style to your home with this Z-Lite outdoor pier mount light.
input_text.Response B: This Z-Lite outdoor pier mount light is finished in black with a matte opal glass shade. It is made of steel, a highly durable material, and is designed to withstand the elements. It has a classic geometric shape that complements a wide range of home styles, including contemporary and craftsmen.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.feedback: I prefer the level of detail in response A, Response B glosses over the facts too much and is more like a standard sales pitch description
